entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
